long_description: Combining a performance liner brief with stretchy outer fabric, the men's Marmot Interval Shorts wick moisture and dry quickly to keep you comfortably pushing through your run. Fabric features high degree of stretch for comfort during movement and protects skin from harsh sunlight with a UPF rating of 30. Quick-drying liner briefs feature a moisture-wicking treatment to maximize comfort. Dial in the fit with the elastic drawcord waist. Store small accessories in the zippered rear pocket, and store energy gels in the specialized rear pockets. The Marmot Interval Shorts for men enhance visibility with reflective highlights, and feature a regular fit with a 7 in. inseam.
short_description: Combining a performance liner brief with stretchy outer fabric, the men's Marmot Interval Shorts wick moisture and dry quickly to keep you comfortably pushing through your run.
